package io.persephone.dsl.element

import io.persephone.dsl.Tag
import io.persephone.dsl.element.*

// generated by HtmlDslGenerator.kt
class META : Tag(tagName = "meta, selfClosing = true") {

	var charset: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("charset")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["charset"] = it
			}
		}

	var content: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("content")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["content"] = it
			}
		}

	var name: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("name")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["name"] = it
			}
		}

}
